seo.title: Manarola Events 2025 | Festivals & Local Celebrations
seo.description: Discover events and festivals in Manarola. Wine harvest, religious celebrations, and the famous nativity scene.

body.title: Events & Festivals
body.subtitle: Experience authentic local celebrations. From the world's largest nativity scene to wine harvest festivals and religious traditions.

features.title: Presepe di Manarola
features.description: World's largest hillside nativity scene. Illuminated Dec 8 - Jan 31 with 300+ figures.

features.title: Grape Harvest Festival
features.description: September celebration of the Sciacchetr√† wine harvest. Tastings and traditional music.

features.title: Feast of San Lorenzo
features.description: August 10 patron saint festival. Procession, mass, and evening fireworks.

features.title: Summer Concerts
features.description: July-August concert series in the church square. Classical and traditional Italian music.

features.title: Sagra dell'Uva
features.description: October grape festival celebrating the wine tradition. Food stalls and wine flowing.

features.title: Regatta dei Rioni
features.description: June rowing competition in the harbor. Teams from different village neighborhoods compete.
